_header: O fie love fie amend your governaunce

BLHar682.First Lines:
A fy loue fy amende yowre goueraunceye are to townysshe bi this
                    book…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…Who so þat good hede on yow tookTo doon on haue of hit
                    plesaunce
BLHar682.Note: As written, repeats first words of lines 1-2 at end to indicate going back to first four lines of the roundel.
